participant_1.background:
My worst fear is losing my family, who I love very much.
I wish I could be the kind of person my parents want me to be.
i like to go to the farmers market every weekend.
I'm looking for a cozy, quiet home with plenty of space for my dog and me.
my mom went crazy when i was three and i have not seen her since.

participant_2.background:
I value my sense of humor.
I take a walk to clear my head and release endorphins.
I would love to learn how to identify different types of trees and wildflowers.
i like to drink chai tea before bed every night.
I would love to be reincarnated as a chef, so I can continue to share my love of food with others.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hello! I like to walk to clear my head and release endorphins. What about you?
I like to go to the farmers market every weekend and look for new and interesting things to cook with.
Oh that sounds fun! I love to cook and bake as well.
Have you ever tried making your own chai tea?
No I haven't, but I've always wanted to! Do you have any tips?
Sure! I always use loose leaf tea instead of tea bags, and I steep it for about 5 minutes. I also like to add a little bit of honey and milk.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to give it a try. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to go hiking and camping. I also like to play video games.
Hiking and camping sound like a lot of fun! I've never been camping before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a great way to get out in nature and relax.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to help out a fellow nature lover.
